actions.name: analyze_call

example.output: Call Analysis: Rapport 9/10, Discovery 7/10, Talk ratio 68% (target <50%), missed budget qualification. Coaching tip: Use BANT framework.

actions.name: assess_skills
actions.description: Comprehensive skill assessment for sales rep

example.output: Skills: Discovery 85%, Objection handling 72%, Closing 68%, Product knowledge 90%. Focus area: Closing techniques.
4-Week Plan: Week 1-2: Closing workshops, Week 3: Objection role-play, Week 4: Live call shadowing. Target: +15% close rate.

actions.name: provide_deal_strategy
actions.description: Get strategic advice for specific deal

example.output: Strategy: Multi-thread to CFO (blocker), use case study from similar company, offer 90-day pilot to reduce risk perception.
Progress: Close rate +8% (30 days), Discovery score +12%, Objection handling +5%. On track for Q1 targets.

actions.name: compare_to_benchmark

example.output: vs Team Avg: Close rate +5%, Deal size -8%, Cycle time -3 days. Strength: Efficiency. Growth area: Deal expansion.
Scenario: 'Your solution is 20% more expensive than competitors.' Best response framework: Acknowledge, Isolate, Solve, Confirm.

demoConversation.content: Analyze my last discovery call with Contoso.

**Call Analysis: Contoso Discovery (32 mins)**

**Strengths:**
- Excellent rapport building (Score: 9/10)
- Strong pain point identification
- Good use of open-ended questions

**Areas for Improvement:**
- Talk ratio 68% (target: <50%)
- Missed budget qualification
- No clear next steps defined

**Coaching Tip:** Try the "BANT" framework next time to ensure budget qualification early.
